channel.title: Financial Reporting & Analysis on Kevin's Codex
channel.description: Recent content in Financial Reporting & Analysis on Kevin's Codex

item.title: 1. Introduction
item.description: Financial Reporting Analysis Financial Reporting : 기업의 이해관계자들에게 주는 회사정보 ⇒ FS + α FS 1 : Balance Sheet (Statement of Financial Position) : 재무 상태표 FS 2 : Income Statement (Statement of Operating Result) : 손익 계산서 FS 3 : Cash Flow Statement : 현금흐름표 FS 4 : Statement of Change in Equity : 자본 변동표 α : audit report, annual report, 경영 report, footnotes etc.
